Producer: Steve Golin, Alix Madigan, Rosalie Swedlin, Myles Nestel
Production Co: Anonymous Content, The Solution Entertainment Group
Synopsis: When 28-year-old Megan attends her 10-year high-school reunion, she realizes that very little in her life has changed. An unexpected marriage proposal from her boyfriend sparks panic in Megan, causing her to wander off into the night. She meets 16-year-old Annika and proceeds to get drunk. Deciding she needs a break from her unfulfilling life, she tells her boyfriend she's going to a seminar but hangs with Annika.
Title: Laggies
